title: Ep 14: Harlow and Ilana Wiles
itunes:title: Ep 14: Harlow and Ilana Wiles
itunes:subtitle: Age doesn’t matter but it’s a big deal that this week GTJBI welcomes its youngest guest ever...because she’s 7 years old.
description:
Age doesn’t matter but it’s a big deal that this week GTJBI welcomes its youngest guest ever...because she’s 7-years-old. Harlow Wiles is in second grade and on the weekends you can find her in the kitchen baking everything from pumpkin bread to cupcakes. But her specialty is pancakes—she charges $1 for one pancake and $5 for two; we love a businesswoman—so she stopped by the studio with her Insta-famous Mom, Ilana (@MommyShorts) to give us some pancake tips and dish on her favorite tv show as of right now, The Property Brothers. And she does NOT know what their actual names are, so do NOT ask, okay?


Follow “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” On Insta: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod 


Harlow’s mom, Ilana, is the best “mommy blogger” I follow, despite my not having kids, and I have been following a lot of MBs for a long time. She has a lot of good intel on how #sponcon works and how she turned a job layoff into a living 10 years ago. She also brought her recommendation for dry shampoo, and it was one I had never even thought about before.


Products Mentioned On This Episode:

  • Makeup Forever Professional Powder: https://fave.co/37zGmSl


Follow Harlow’s Adventures:

  • Harlow’s Baking Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nCkr44_XEvo
  • @MommyShorts on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mommyshorts/


Thanks for listening!

Check out blog posts and all of the recommended products by past guests, listeners and Caroline at www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 


Shop the spreadsheet (updated with new recs all of the time!): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vdIkPMWhV0FlRux3u_DVpuGvakQxkF3EbYT2ZVv45B8/edit#gid=0 and the Amazon store: https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod


Want to get in touch more formally? Have a rec you want to rec? Shoot me an email! Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
